page.title: 09Brookmans Park Railway St.
page.content: The railway station which connects Brookmans Park with either Moorgate or King's Cross in London, is one of the main reasons for the existence of Brookmans Park. It is so important that we decided to ask the parents of the children in our school some questions which are as follows. The results may be seen on the following page. Q.1.Do you use the train service; a.Not at all b.More than 3 times a week c.Less than three times a week? Q.2.Do you use it mostly for; a.Pleasure b.Business Q.3.Where do you normally travel? a.London b.Welwyn Garden City c.Potters Bar d.Other Q.4.Is station car parking adequate? a.Yes b.Needs to be extended. Q.5.Should the service be improved? a.No.b.Faster service.c.More trains.
